body_html:
we fixed this with newly issued binaries 3 days and 12 hours ago.
PyTorch no longer installs or depends on cudatoolkit == 9.

I'm surprised that your conda didn't install our updated binaries (you reported the issue 2 days ago). Wondering if you installed your PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12 hours ago -- but opened an issue 2 days ago. If that's not the case, I'll investigate further.

Thanks for reporting.

Thanks for reporting.
body:
we fixed this with newly issued binaries 3 days and 12 hours ago.
PyTorch no longer installs or depends on `cudatoolkit == 9`.

I'm surprised that your `conda` didn't install our updated binaries (you reported the issue 2 days ago). Wondering if you installed your PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12 hours ago -- but opened an issue 2 days ago. If that's not the case, I'll investigate further.

Thanks for reporting.
